Workflow.Name: ReviewHub - Remove Records Older Than 12 Months
Workflow.Description:
This flow removes all records from the dataverse tables that represent the information being displayed on each scorecard in Review Hub.
Failure of this flow results in a decrease in performance for the Review Hub Application and also results in the breach of Review Hub's data retention policy.
